title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: slit tapestry
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Given to Mrs. Fraser by her sister Miss Myra R. Tutt.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Fruit and flowering trees growing from rocks on a dark blue background.  Two cranes and two bats in sky.  Some painted details.
